actions.text: On agreeing to the Haaland amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Haaland amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A028) offered by Ms. Haaland.

description: An amendment numbered 28 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to clarify that federal criminal information database sharing exte nds to entities designated by a tribe as maintaining public safety within a tribes territorial jurisdiction that have no federal or state arrest authority.
